title: Your richest gift
brief_description: A good industrial safety record is the result of co-operation between management and employees. Safety equipment and safe working habits are necessary to prevent accidents. To protect the eyes safety glasses or goggles should be worn at all times. Shows the safety procedures operating at the Owens-Illinois factory.
